column3:
The angel alligator was quite the sight!  It loved to scream with all its might!
ewline
ewlineIt loved to roll in mud and sun.  Then it would go for a run.
ewline
ewlineBut why did it run?  Why did it scream?  
ewline
ewlineIt had a fork in its butt!  
ewline
ewlineIt sat in a trashcan.  This was not a smart thing to do!  But he did it, oh yes, oh me, oh you!
ewline
ewlineThe alligator had a beard.  It was a great beard.  But nobody ever talked about his beard.  Why?  Because they would only see the fork in its butt!
ewline
ewlineBut one day, the alligator made a friend.  The friend needed a fork.  How was he to eat his spaghetti without a fork?  
ewline
ewlineBut...I'm not sure a butt fork is the best way to eat spaghetti.
ewline
ewlineDo you?
column4: one: What did the angel alligator have?
column9: one: What did the friend need?
column14: multiple: What was not a smart thing to do?
column19: multiple: What did the angel alligator love to do?
